title: Cannot access toolbars or send from the "Write" screen
content: My "Write" screen has suddenly become useless. It will not show any toolbars, including the Composition bar. So no Send button, no sending. Even the formatting bar below the subject line is grayed out and inert. Looks like this is a longtime failing. I tried solutions offered in earlier threads and none helped. Pressing Alt on the keyboard does not produce a temporary Menu Bar. Help!
creator: erics1

title: Microsoft 365 email not connecting properly
content:
I'm having trouble setting up my Microsoft 365 email from GoDaddy.

After setting everything up I get an error message saying that it is "authenticated but not connected".

I've tried troubleshooting with GoDaddy to no help. I've followed what many said helped them with the same problem and set "network.dns.disableIPv6" to "true". Still not working.

Anybody have any other tips?

Thanks in advance!
creator: chuck83

title: HELP, PLEASE. Email (receiving and sending) stopped working on the 12th
content: We have 3 email accounts, each for out business. 1 of them stopped working several years ago with no resolve but we didn't use it that much to make it matter. Now our main email is not working. It stopped working on the 12th of July. We are not getting emails and our business RELIES on this. We are at a total loss. I've tried everything. I can send email from the main which is no longer working to the other one that still works but cannot send anywhere outside that. I'm not real knowledgeable with this stuff but I did empty the trash. We had 4 years of trash emails that needed dumped so I did that. Still notihing. The server is a POP3 and the port is correct. 110 is the default on all 3. The outgoing server (SMTP) what ever that is, is the default server for the email that is not working. WE ARE DESPERATE HERE. PLEASE SOMEONE HELP US.
creator: sdallas611

title: Mozilla Thunderbird
content:
export - import um den Rechner zu wechseln von Win7 auf Win10, liefert nur die Adressb√ºcher, aber nicht die bisherigen Mails. Beide haben die gleiche Version.

// I want to update my PC to an newer Version with another Hardware.. On both is the same version (aktuell version) istalled. By exporting settings from the old PC to an *.Zip - file an then on the new Hardware importing that file i only get the adressbooks and settings but not the Emails in the different folders. Instead i get a set of new but empty "Local Folders"... The *.zip is only 72MB great but contains 307 empty "folderCache-nnn.json" files.. What is my problem??? best regards Thomas Schipper

title: how to remove unwanted screen
content:
Just updated from version 60.9.1 to latest (don't ask why). Just spent hours putting things back the way they were, but cannot find a way to get rid of the screen containing things like "Choose What to Set Up", "Import from Another Program", "About Mozilla Thunderbird" etc that shows when no folder is selected from any account (see attached screenshot). I would prefer to see a blank screen in this area when no account folder is selected as previously.

Any way to remove this? if not, how about taking this as a request. Thanks.
creator: dogdogonholiday
